org.easybatch.core.api

Interface Record<P>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - The record's payload type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApacheCommonCsvRecord, FileRecord, FlatFileRecord, GenericRecord, JdbcRecord, JmsRecord, JsonRecord, MongoDBRecord, PoisonRecord, StringRecord, XmlRecord

    public interface Record<P>
    Interface for input records.

    A record can be:

    • A line in a flat file
    • A tag in a xml file
    • A row in a database table
    • A file in a directory
    • A message in a queue
    • etc
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Method Summary

      Return the record's header.
      P getPayload()
      Return the record's payload.
